Click Here for NF signing info!

Here are our "Best of 2022" staff lists, with great assists from some friends of the store and a playlist of a few of our favorite tracks. If you bought music from us or spent some time in our shops this year, we appreciate your support so much!

NF "HOPE" CD/LP Pre-Order for Artist Signing - On Tuesday April 11th at 4PM, NF will be appearing in person at Reckless Records in Wicker Park to sign purchased copies of his new album HOPE! More details in the link

WATERPARKS acoustic in-store/meet & greet Tuesday April 18th at 5PM in Wicker Park.
We're aware that the band's site has a ticket link but this is a FREE EVENT. The band will play a brief acoustic set then there will be a meet & greet. This is not a signing but photos will be allowed. The first 50 people in line will get a free poster pre-signed by the band. We'll give out wristbands & that will get you the poster. Their new album "Intellectural Property" will be available at the event on LP/CD.

We need to suspend ordering on the website for a little while. We are very sorry. Our stock will continue to update on the site for our Chicago patrons, but the cart function has been disabled.
Life, work, and commerce are complicated these days and we will be working to restore activity as soon as we possibly can. Thanks for your patience and support.

-- Reckless Records

About Us:

Reckless Records is a group of three record stores in Chicago IL. We carry new & used CDs, DVDs games and loads of Vinyl. Originally started in London, our first Chicago location opened in 1989. (LPs & 7"s). We would love to have you visit us in person.

We are always looking to buy your unwanted CDs, DVDs, and vinyl. Please get in touch if you are interested in selling your collections. We buy at all locations every day up to an hour before closing time.

You can also visit:
         

     The Reckless Blog

     Reckless Records eBay store

We still have a shop in London too! They are located in Soho at:
30 Berwick Street
London W1F 8RH
Reckless Records London

FACS
Still Life In Decay ("crimson Crush" Color Vinyl)
Trouble in Mind
The always reliable FACS are back with a new one in 2023. After a few albums with a lot of studio trickery & manipulation, this one is mostly pretty straight forward recording-wise. The result is probably the most accurate documentation of what a force they are as a live band. Driving & repetitive THIS HEAT esque rhythms with sparse & brittle guitar from Brian. His voice is also way on top here which also gives this record a different feel. Another great one from these local heroes. RECOMMENDED.
Available at: Belmont and Milwaukee Ave
New LP $17.99
CLEVELAND, SHANA
Manzanita (color Vinyl)
Hardly Art
Shana Cleveland is back with her third solo album. The LA LUZ member has crafted a wonderful album of dusty folk tunes with hints of baroque & goth. Think Jessica Pratt with hints of Sibylle Baier, ghosts of Laurel Canyon & 60s British folk. RECOMMENDED.
Available at: Milwaukee Ave and Loop
New LP $23.99
ENSLAVED
Heimdal (2lp)
Nuclear Blast
Those of you that have been stalking our metal sections for the past decade + will know that we love ENSLAVED at Reckless. There was a while there where they seemed almost unstoppable. They've slowed down a little bit after losing their long term drummer, covid restrictions etc... but they're back in '23 with their 16th (!!) album. The previous album "Utgard" was their most straight-ahead metal album in years & this one is the opposite, probably their most progressive record in years. Complex arrangements, their classic blend of harsh & clean vocals & some cool synth textures & experimentation while making sure not to forget some truly stoked-worthy riffage & epic soloing. RECOMMENDED!
Available at: All Stores
New LP $34.99
CHUA, LUCINDA
Yian (clear Vinyl)
4AD
Singer and cellist LUCINDA CHUA follows up her 2021 album "Antidotes" with another spacious, introspective LP filled with lush tones, orchestral dynamics and soft, impressionisti vocals. CHUA formerly worked with the moniker FELIX on Kranky records, and this should appeal to fans of her Kranky labelmates GROUPER and LOW. On 4AD and RECOMMENDED!
Available at: All Stores
New LP $21.99
COLOURED BALLS
Ball Power (reissue, Blue/white Vinyl)
Just Add Water
Just Add Water hits it out of the park with this reissue of the 1973 album from Australia's COLOURED BALLS. Like THE SAINTS & RADIO BIRDMAN, COLOURED BALLS played hard rock with hints of what was to come with punk rock & some power pop influence. Lead guitarist Lobby Loyde was the group's wild card, with incredible soloing ala Randy Holden with interesting use of effects. Any fan of Aussie proto-punk & early punk absolutely MUST pick this up. INCREDIBLE!!
Available at: All Stores
New LP $25.99
LES RALLIZES DENUDES
Mizutani (reissue)
Temporal Drift
Temporal Drift's official LES RALLIZES DENUDES reissue series continues with three new releases on the same day. There's been a ton of music released over the years but almost all of it has been unofficial. The band actually only released three proper albums during their 30 year existence. "Mizutani" is an outlier for the band as they're best known for their scorching, blown-out live recordings but this one is a mellow album of outsider folk tunes featuring the band in a stripped-down duo form recorded in 1970.
Available at: All Stores
New LP $33.99
LES RALLIZES DENUDES
'77 Live (2lp Reissue, Clear Vinyl)
Temporal Drift
Temporal Drift's official LES RALLIZES DENUDES reissue series continues with three new releases on the same day. There's been a ton of music released over the years but almost all of it has been unofficial. The band actually only released three proper albums during their 30 year existence. "'77 Live" was recorded in Tokyo in 1977 & displays their famous blown-out, feedback drenched sound perfectly.
Available at: All Stores
New LP $53.99
LES RALLIZES DENUDES
'67- '69 Studio Et Live (reissue)
Temporal Drift
Temporal Drift's official LES RALLIZES DENUDES reissue series continues with three new releases on the same day. There's been a ton of music released over the years but almost all of it has been unofficial. The band actually only released three proper albums during their 30 year existence. "'67-'69" documents the early years of the band & these are the most experimental & far-out recordings from these reissues hinting at what was to come with noise music in Japan & other countries around the world in the coming decades.
Available at: All Stores
New LP $33.99
SMILE
Europe: Live Recordings 2022 (12", 6trks)
XL
This lovely companion EP for "A Light For Attracting Attention" showcases live renditions performed across Europe in 2022, and includes a version of Thom Yorke's 2009 solo track "FeelingPulledApartByHorses". Super duper limited and very RECOMMENDED!
Available at: Milwaukee Ave and Loop
New LP $18.99
FELT
Gold Mine Trash (reissue)
1972 Records
We're big fans of FELT here at Reckless so any reissue is reason to celebrate. This compilation was originally released in 1987 & it documents their released on Cherry Red between 1981-1985. RECOMMENDED!
Available at: All Stores
New LP $27.99
